text: @JustinTrudeau @cafreeland @PattyHajdu @CPHO_Canada @Bill_Morneau @jyduclos I don't understand why we are not stopping everything at the borders or especially at the airports... it's started from airport and why we are letting people in without proper check up.We should'nt have all the positive numbers of COVID19 if we have done a good job at the airport
